ISLAMABAD, MONDAY, AUGUST 2, 1976 
PART II 
Statutory Notifications (S. R. 0.) 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKISTAN 
COUNCIL OF ISLAMIC IDEOLOGY 
NOTIFICATIONS 
Lahore, the 29th July, 1976 
S.R.0 774 (I)/76,---In exercise of the powers conferred by Article 231 of the 
nstitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the Council of Islamic Ideology 
;11 the approval of the President, makes the following amendment in the 
'midi of Islamic Ideology (Procedure) Rules, 1974, namely : 
In the aforesaid Rules, rule 14 shall be re-numbered as sub-rule (1) of that rule 
and after sub-rule (1) re-numbered as aforesaid, the following new sub-
rule shall be added, namely 
"(2) The recommendations under paragraph (a), (c) or (d) of clause (1) of 
Article 230, and advice under paragraph (b) of the said clause, shall be 
transmitted to Parliament, a Provincial Assembly or, as the case may 
be, the authority making a reference under Article 229, through the 
Federal Government, and the Interim Annual Reports and the final 
report referred to in clause (4) of Article 230 shall be submitted to the 
Federal Government. 
SHEIKH AKHTAR ALI, 
Secretary. 
CENTRAL BOARD OF REVENUE 
Islamabad,the27thJuly, 1976 
CENTRAL EXCISE 
r.O. 775(I)/76,—In exercise of the powers conferred by rule 12-A of the 
Excise Rules, 1944, the Central Board of Revenue is pleased to direct that
